Format: for(size_t i = 0  len = strlen(string); i< len; i++) string[i] = toupper(string[i]); for (char *c = string; *c != '\0'; c++) *c = toupper(*c);

Languages: C++<ref>std::string only  result is stored in string result which is at least as long as string  and may or may not be string itself</ref>
